Ilja Preuss-2 wrote:
> 
> How did you code the suite?
> 
> bpuzon wrote:
>> Hello,
>>I tried to write a TestSuite containig all the Test cases,
>> but then I receive the "No tests found with test runner "JUnit4"".
>> 
>> How to ensure a method is called once for a testing process?
> 
> 
I added this to all test classes:
public static junit.framework.Test suite() {
        return new junit.framework.JUnit4TestAdapter(SimpleTest.class);
    },
created new TestSuite, performed suite.add(allMyTestClassess.class) and
tried to run it. I also tried to make all my test classes extend TestCase,
but it didn't help.

--
